name: Bwa Studios
description: BWA Studios is an animation house that creates and produces programming and content for all platforms. As a Black female-owned studio, they aim to build equity in the animation industry by consciously recruiting Black women, women of color, and nonbinary people of color

name: Calabash Animation
description: Calabash Animation is an animation studio based in Chicago, Illinois, known for creating award-winning 2D, CGI, and motion graphics animations for TV, film, and the web. They have a reputation for delighting clients and audiences with their artistry and have worked with iconic brands

name: Lion Forge Entertainment
address: St. Louis, Missouri (Note: While not in Illinois, it is a prominent Black-owned animation studio mentioned in the search results.)
description: Lion Forge Entertainment is an Academy Award-winning animation and live-action studio founded by David Steward II, passionate about authentic storytelling and diverse voices. They produce cinematic comics, games, and animation

name: Martian Blueberry
description: Co-founded by Love Barnett and Carl Jones, Martian Blueberry is an animation powerhouse focused on creating diverse and inclusive narratives. Carl Jones is known for his work on "The Boondocks," "Black Dynamite," and "Sugar and Toys."

name: Magic Carpet Studios
description: Founded by Ferdy Adimefe, Magic Carpet Studios is committed to transforming human consciousness by putting authentic African stories on the global entertainment map. They started as a 2D animation studio and have expanded into games, cut-outs, and 3D animation

name: Komotion Studios
description: Komotion Studios, founded by Kolawole Olarewaju, specializes in design, 3D visualization, motion graphics, and animation. They are known for projects like "Dawn Of Thunder," which merges an African prince's origin story with the Yoruba god of thunder, Sango

name: Small Town Animation Studios
address: Southeast Georgia (Note: Not in Illinois, but a Black-owned studio.)
description: Founded by Jermaine Hargrove, Small Town Animation Studios focuses on developing and producing 3D CGI feature film/TV animation for a global audience

name: Chaz Bottoms Animation Studios (CBA Studios)
address: Los Angeles, California (Note: Not in Illinois, but a prominent Black-owned 2D animation studio.)
description: Founded by Chaz Bottoms, CBA Studios is a 2D animation studio committed to diversity and powerful storytelling. They have worked with clients such as Disney and Apple TV, and collaborated with John Legend and LeBron James

name: D'Art Shtajio
address: Japan (Note: The first American anime studio in Japan and a major Black-owned anime studio.)
description: Founded by twin brothers Arthell and Darnell Isom, and animator Henry Thurlow, D'Art Shtajio is known for its work on hit shows like "Attack on Titan" and "One Piece," as well as commercials for brands like Adidas and Asos

name: Vignette Films
description: Co-founded by Leo Sullivan (Disney's first Black animator) and Floyd Norman, Vignette Films was Hollywood's first Black-owned animation studio. They produced educational films about Black historical figures and worked on TV productions like "Hey, Hey, Hey, It's Fat Albert" and the "Soul Train" intro
